How to open the IMAP Service
The information below will help us to solve the problem:
Your version is too low. You can update to the latest version and get better service.

Verification may take effect after two minutes.
Verification may take effect after two minutes.

he account has log into too many device.

"All user data in %1$s will be cleared after reactivate."

"User Instructions: 1. NetEase Phone Number Mail is connected with your phone. If you stop using the number, you should turn it off in time. If you change the number, you should turn off the old one and activate the new one in time. 2. For the case above, you should inform your friends and family in time that your NetEase Phone Number Mail is terminated or changed. NetEase Inc. does not assume any responsibility for any losses caused by your mistake not to close or notice timely."
If Normal Push is enabled, new message will notify you timely.
